channel.title: Need Vocals Song Challenge: I NEED VOCALSSSSS. please?
channel.description: I have a song that I want to include vocals in and I need your help. Here is the SoundCloud link: https://soundcloud.com/ninjendo1/need-vocals You can send me an audio recording of your voice in a zip file. The voice that fits it beautifully the most will Be mixed in with the song and published on my page with your name in feature. Thanks.

item.title: Need Vocals Song Challenge: I NEED VOCALSSSSS. please?
item.dc:creator: xavior
item.description:
If you’re willing to spend a little green, I highly recommend you do some searching on Fiverr.com. That’s where I found the amazing singers for all of my tracks and I made some useful connections out of those collaborations as well. You really get the bang for your buck (if you do your research). Totally worth it!

Read full topic

item.title: Need Vocals Song Challenge: I NEED VOCALSSSSS. please?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Ninjendo:

If you are willing to put in lyrics your welcome to do so.

Nono, I’m (lazily) on the lookout for a lyricist also. The pieces I’m working on don’t have a vocal melody written yet either.

I’m interested to find a lyricist and/or vocalist who can contribute their own take on that aspect too.

I might throw it up as a possible collaboration, though I might not do that just here.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Vocals Song Challenge: I NEED VOCALSSSSS. please?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Do you already have lyrics? (Not offering, just curious.)

Interested to see how this turns out, as I have at least a couple of pieces that are intended to be finished as electro-pop songs/tracks. Both have neither lyrics or vocals yet.
